text: Castres may refer to: * Castres, a commune in the Tarn department in the Midi- Pyrénées region * Castres, Aisne, a commune in the Aisne department in the Picardy region * Castres-Gironde, a commune in the Gironde department in the Aquitaine region * Arrondissement of Castres, an arrondissement in the Tarn department in the Midi-Pyrénées region
title: Castres (disambiguation)
